summary: GeneralTracker serves as an abstract foundation for all logging integrations, defining a standard interface that includes properties for the tracker identifier, directory requirements, and access to the underlying tracking mechanism. It also supports optional main-process-only execution and provides utility routines to configure, record, and conclude logging activities.
business_intent: Establish a consistent and extensible base for incorporating diverse experiment tracking tools (such as TensorBoard or wandb) into machineâ€‘learning workflows, handling configuration propagation and lifecycle management uniformly.
